description: This file defines React components related to a toast notification UI, including provider, viewport, individual toast items, and actions, utilizing Radix UI primitives and custom styling.

methods.name: ToastViewport
methods.description: React component rendering the toast viewport container with specific styling and positioning.

methods.name: Toast
methods.description: React component representing an individual toast notification, customizable with variants.

methods.name: ToastAction
methods.description: React component for an action button within the toast, styled accordingly.

methods.name: ToastClose
methods.description: React component for the close button of the toast.

methods.name: ToastTitle
methods.description: React component for the toast title.

methods.name: ToastDescription
methods.description: React component for the toast description text.
